long_description: Offering good value for seasons of great rides, the aluminum Easton EA50 Road Bar features a shape to keep you comfortably pedaling away the miles. Compact reach and drop with an ergonomic bend provides comfort and stability for hands and reduces fatigue. 280g weight.
short_description: Offering good value for seasons of great rides, the aluminum Easton EA50 Road Bar features a shape to keep you comfortably pedaling away the miles.
